#Text=Chibougamau
#Text=Chibougamau , population 7500 ( 2011 ) , is the largest regional centre in Northern Quebec .
#Text=It was founded as a mining village in 1950 , and was incorporated as a municipality in 1954 .
#Text=History
#Text=The area has long been part of the Cree First Nation ( Aboriginal ) territory .
#Text=It was in the early 17th century that French explorers and traders , including Charles Albanel in 1671 , came to the Lake Chibougamau area .
#Text=However , no permanent European settlements were established at that time .
#Text=In the late 19th century , the area attracted the interest of mining prospectors .
#Text=When gold was discovered in 1903 , there were periods of intense exploration .
#Text=Due to difficulty of access , no lasting development took place until 1949 when copper was exploited , with the opening of a multi-metallic mine in the area .
#Text=A permanent community was established in 1952 .
#Text=Chibougamau started out as a company town but soon after , in 1954 , it was incorporated as a municipality .
#Text=Many mines have exploited the area since .
#Text=While still thought of as a mining town , Chibougamau is now also the centre of a large logging and sawmill industry .
#Text=By car
#Text=From southern Québec , the general route to Chibougamau-Chapais is Route 167 from Lac St-Jean , from where it is possible to travel to Trois-Rivières via Shawinigan and Roberval on Route 155 .
#Text=Western Québec and Ontario are connected to Chibougamau by Route 113 , connecting to Route 117 at Louvicourt near Val-d'Or .
#Text=Both routes are paved and have a speed limit of 90 km/h .
#Text=The North Road ( Route du Nord ) , an isolated gravel road , connects Chibougamau to the James Bay Road ( Route de la Baie-James ) .
#Text=By bus
#Text=Intercar , 501 4ième rue ( one block south of Hôtel Chibougamau ) , ☏ +1 418-547-2167 , toll-free : +1-800-806-2167 , fax : +1 418-547-0923 .
#Text=Intercar ( 2249 , rue St-Hubert , Jonquière ) operates a bus service to Chibougamau .
#Text=Their buses are available through most of the province , including Quebec City ( 7-7½ hours , $ 100 ) and the Saguenay region .
#Text=By plane
#Text=Chibougamau/Chapais Airport ( YMT ) ( midway between Chibougamau and Chapais along Route 113 , 18 km southwest of Chibougamau ) , ☏ +1 418-748-3764 .
#Text=Daily flights with Air Creebec from Montréal-Dorval ( except Saturday ) .
#Text=Get around
#Text=There is no public transport in Chibougamau .
#Text=There are two local taxi services on 3rd Street :
#Text=Taxi Diamond , 473 3ième rue , ☏ +1 418-748-7725 .
#Text=Taxi Coop , 557 3ième rue , ☏ +1 418-748-7651 .
#Text=See
#Text=Mining Discovery Centre ( Centre d'intérêt minier de Chibougamau ) , 924 Route 167 nord , ☏ +1 418-748-4209 .
#Text=Museum in former Bruneau mine covering mining history from the ancient Pharaohs ' search for gold to modern times , plus a guided tour of the mine .
#Text=Cree communities : Chibougamau is the largest regional centre to visit the aboriginal Cree communities of Oujé-Bougoumou ( 47 km west ) and Mistissini ( 86 km north ) .

#Text=Oujé-Bougoumou was designed by renowned Canadian architect Douglas Cardinal , who designed the Museum of Civilization in Gatineau , Québec , and has received UNESCO recognition as a model community due to sustainable development practices and cultural preservation .
#Text=Wildlife abounds .
#Text=Bears are sometimes visible at the municipal dump .
#Text=Do
#Text=Festival Folifrets .
#Text=Chibougamau celebrates the winter .
#Text=Ten days at the end of Feb to mid-March .
#Text=Antique snowmobile rally , endurance run .
#Text=Centre de plein air du Mont Chalco , 264 route 167 , ☏ +1 418-748-7162 .
#Text=Snowboarding , ski rental , 11 slopes , a triple chairlift , a tube run , snowblades , 29 km ( 18 mi ) of cross-country ski trails and a snowshoe trail .
#Text=Club de Golf de Chibougamau , 130 , rue des Forces-Armées , ☏ +1 418-748-4709 , ✉ golfchibougamau@hotmail.com .
#Text=Nine-hole golf course , golf cart , club and ball rental , restaurant , conference facilities .
#Text=Mid-May to mid-Sept .
#Text=Escapade Boréale , 1252 route 167 , Chapais , ☏ +1 418-770-8351 .
#Text=Tent , canoe and parasail rental .
#Text=Paraski Boréal , ☏ +1 418-770-8342 , ✉ paraskiboreal@hotmail.com .
#Text=Kite skiing .
#Text=Paraski Flex and IKO instruction and equipment .
#Text=Lake Gilman .
#Text=Walking , biking and fishing .
#Text=Mini-Golf , 651 , 3e Rue , ☏ +1 418-748-2225 . 18 holes .
#Text=Chess club “ Les fous de la tour de glace ” on-site .
#Text=Pourvoirie Chibougamau , Lac Laganière , route 167 Nord , La Doré ( 8 km N of Chibougamau ) , ☏ +1418 630-6898 .
#Text=Outfitter and fishing camp with 2-6 person cottages ( kitchen , running water , propane , patio , shower , BBQ ) .
#Text=Salle de quilles Bolorama , 160 , avenue Lafontaine , ☏ +1 418-748-7286 , toll-free : +1-877-420-5996 .
#Text=Eight-lane bowling alley . from $ 10 .
#Text=Snowmobile trails lead across the province , from Rouyn-Noranda through Chibougamau to the Saguenay .
#Text=Buy
#Text=Centre Commercial Place Le Chaînon , 466 3e Rue .
#Text=Eat
#Text=All of the following restaurants are located on 3e rue .
#Text=Au Petit Bedon , 466 3ième rue , ☏ +1 418-748-6045 .
#Text=Casse Croûte Louka , 586 3ième rue , ☏ +1 418-748-2232 .
#Text=Chateau Chibougamau , 966 3ième rue , ☏ +1 418-748-6447 .
#Text=Chez Jo-Anne , 541 3ième rue , ☏ +1 418-748-7980 .
#Text=Chez Julie , 541 3ième rue , ☏ +1 418-748-7444 .
#Text=Dinner style restaurant serving breakfast , hamburgers , poutine and other rather greasy dishes .
#Text=Le Coq Rôti , 453 3ième rue , ☏ +1 418-748-1144 .
#Text=Chicken rotisserie belonging to a province wide chain , they serve various chicken dishes as well as pasta and pizza .
#Text=Rendez-Vous Copains , 920 3ième rue , ☏ +1 418-748-3494 .
#Text=Drink
#Text=All of the below bars are on 3e rue .
#Text=Le Gwillim , 560 3ième rue , ☏ +1 418-748-7533 .
#Text=Popular local nightclub that attracts a very young crowd , impressive selection of shooters .
#Text=La Ptite Broue , 535 3ième rue , ☏ +1 418-748-4848 .
#Text=Another fairly popular pub that attracts a good crowd on weekends .
#Text=Pub Royal , 502 3ième rue , ☏ +1 418-748-3643 .
#Text=Popular local bar/sports bar/pub , with music weekend nights , serving a wide variety of imported and local beers , liqueurs , absinthe , and various dishes .
#Text=Le Rendez-Vous at the Hôtel Chibougamau typically attracts a large aboriginal crowd .
#Text=Pool table and gaming machines .
#Text=Le CabArrêt is the local strip club .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=All of the following accommodations are located on 3e rue ( Route 167 ) :
#Text=Éco-Camping ( municipal campground ) , 512 Route 167 Sud , ☏ +1 418-748-7276 , fax : +1 418-748-1110 .
#Text=Mid-May to Labour Day , 42 campsites for tents and RVs on Lac Sauvage , sports field and equipment , playground , Wi-Fi , wood , showers , laundry , bicycle rental .
#Text=Pet-friendly .
#Text=Just outside the city on Route 167 .
#Text=Motel Harricana , 1000 3ième rue , ☏ +1 418-748-7771 , fax : +1 418-748-2887 .
#Text=100 rooms , TV/radio , laundry , conference facilities for 175 ( restaurant/bar ) .
#Text=Motel Nordic , 966 3ième rue , ☏ +1 418-748-7686 , toll-free : +1-888-748-6673 , fax : +1 418-748-6538 . 52 rooms , a/c , dvd , wi-fi , refrigerators .
#Text=Resto-Bistro Roméo et Juliette .
#Text=Large hotel in centre of town with Internet , video , minibar , laundry , meeting facilities , « Le Bon Accueil » restaurant , « Le Rendez-vous » and « La Tourelle » bars .
